name: The Hat Man (itch)
description:
You are a recreational benadryl enthusiast who accidentally took a little more than what you could tolerate!

You wake up in a randomly generated maze, and you realize you are not alone...

You are being chased by your worst nightmare... The Hat Man!

Collect all the benadryl so that you can fall back asleep and escape the nightmare...

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Shift - Sprint

Mouse - Look around

More updates potentially coming in near future
